name: B.E.S. Big Core MK-4
text:
If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can place 3 Counters on this card, then you can place 1 Counter on each "B.E.S." monster you control. 
 You can only use each of the following effects of "B E.S. Big Core Mk 4" once per turn. 
 If you control no monsters: You can discard 1 "B.E.S.", "B.E.T.", or "B.E.F." card; Special Summon both this card from your hand, and 1 "B.E.S." monster from your GY.
 (Quick Effect): You can target 1 card your opponent controls; remove 2 Counters from this card, and if you do, return that target to the hand.
